data.title: Raul Garcia - Men's Tennis
data.meta_description:
Raul  Garcia - As a Senior (2023-24) 
Posted a 15-4 record in singles action… played all of his matches from line one… ended the season on an nine match winning
data.text:
As a Senior (2023-24)

Posted a 15-4 record in singles action… played all of his matches from line one… ended the season on an nine match winning streak… was 12-5 in doubles play with two partners… posted an 11-5 record with Harvey Conway…won his lone match with Mikolaj Lis.

As a Junior (2022-23)

Went 10-8 in singles action… Played exclusively on line one… was 4-3 in conference play in singles… took down Shaheed Alam of no. 1 Keiser in straight sets 7-5, 6-4… ended the season with a four match win streak… went 6-11 in doubles action with three partners… teamed with Harvey Conway and posted a 6-7 record… had an 0-2 record with Seru Tezuka… also played two conference matches with Hugo Salmeron.

As a Sophomore (2021-22)

Was 13-4 in singles action … 13 wins were tied for second on the team this season … played primarily at No. 2 where he posted a 12-2 record … was 7-1 in conference play in singles … took down Jamie Connel (16-5) of Furman in straight sets by a score of 6-4,6-3 at No. 1. … picked up key ASUN wins over Josh Wilson (Liberty), Nilo Duarte (UNF) and Marcelo Sepulveda (FGCU) … went on a five-match win streak during non-conference play and a six-match winning streak to close conference play … was 12-2 in doubles with two partners … Teamed with Harvey Conway and posted an 8-1 record in doubles including a 6-0 record against ASUN opponents … Also was 4-1 with Hugo Salmeron as his partner in non-conference action.

As a Freshman (2020-21)

» ASUN All-Freshmen Team

» ASUN Second Team All-Conference

» ASUN Player of the Week (4/7)

Finished the season with a 10-7 record in singles including a 5-1 record in ASUN play ... his ten singles wins tied for the most on the team this season ... played primarily at the No. 3 position in singles before playing four out of the last five matches at No. 2. ... was 7-5 at No. 3 and 3-1 at No. 2 in singles. ... won six consecutive singles matches from March 14 through April 11 and nine of his 10 singles wins came in straight sets ... finished 7-12 in doubles playing with four different partners. ... teamed with Harvey Conway and collected a 6-5 record at the No. 2 spot. ... was named ASUN Player of the Week on April 7.

Prep

Is the No.1 ranked player in Bolivia in the under 16 and 18 divisions ... has ranked as high as #1248 in the ATP Singles Rankings and won multiple ITF Junior titles ... has a UTR high rating of 13.4.
